headline: Should Darden Restaurants' (DRI) Strong Q4 Earnings and Guidance Shift Investor Expectations?
summary: Darden Restaurants recently reported fourth-quarter results, posting adjusted earnings per share of $2.98 and issuing full-year adjusted EPS guidance between $10.50 and $10.70. This performance, which surpassed analyst expectations, has reinforced positive sentiment among analysts who continue to rate the stock as a 'Moderate Buy.' We'll now consider how Darden's better-than-expected earnings and new guidance could influence its investment outlook going forward. Rare earth metals are the new...
